attributes.action: require all MP's to wear sweat shirts displaying their private interests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request that the Prime Minister institutes a dress policy amongst all sitting MP's which requires each MP to wear a sweat shirt top(perhaps of the colour of their Party) which displays, in a list, all of the private interests and details of which Boards they sit on etc.

If any one individual MP has a list which does not fit on, it could continue on the back of the sweat shirt.

Whenever any MP is carrying out their public duties, they should be required to wear their top (eg on Question Time, at a public meeting, at their Surgeries, on their public visits etc.)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
